items.content_html: This GitHub repository hosts a simple command-line calculator project, designed to provide basic arithmetic functionality within the terminal environment. Whether you're a beginner seeking to understand programming fundamentals or an experienced developer looking for a lightweight tool, this project offers a straightforward solution.

Whether you're a beginner seeking to understand programming fundamentals or an experienced developer looking for a lightweight tool, this project offers a straightforward solution.
